description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Superintendent leads the school district’s educational programs and operations including finances, staff, and facilities. They report to the School Board and also take input from the community. They are responsible for using the district’s resources to give students the best education possible.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
